name: treasure-finder
description: Chrome extension for spotting and reporting UX issues like discovering treasure

scripts.package: zip -r treasure-finder-v$npm_package_version.zip manifest.json popup.html popup.js content.js background.js options.html options.js jira-integration.js styles.css options.css icons/
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
